revision.comment: Uploading cleanup listing, based on data of 2010-03-12
revision.text:
{{User:WolterBot/Cleanup listing header}} == About this listing == The listing is based on a database snapshot of {{date|2010-03-12}}. It contains all articles flagged for cleanup which are tagged with {{tl|WikiProject Google}} on their talk page. Based on that data, 352 articles are assigned to this project, of which 149, or 42.3%, are flagged for cleanup. No quality assessment information was found for this project. No importance assessment information was found for this project. == Listing by number of categories assigned == === Articles with 17 cleanup categories assigned ===
ArticleMaintenance categories
[[AOL]] Articles lacking reliable references (May 2009, Sep 2009), Articles needing additional references (Mar 2008, Sep 2008, May 2009), Articles needing cleanup (Jan 2010), Articles with dead external links (Nov 2009), Articles with minor POV problems (Feb 2008), Articles with sections that need to be turned into prose (Jan 2010), Articles with unsourced statements (Jun 2007, Sep 2008, Nov 2008, May 2009, Sep 2009), BLP articles lacking sources, Cleanup from section, NPOV disputes (Nov 2008)
=== Articles with 6 cleanup categories assigned ===
ArticleMaintenance categories
[[AdSense]] Articles needing additional references (Jun 2009), Articles with unsourced statements (Oct 2007, Jun 2008, Jul 2008, May 2009, Oct 2009)
[[Criticism of YouTube]] Articles needing cleanup (Dec 2009, Feb 2010), Articles to be expanded (Feb 2010), Articles with dead external links (Dec 2008), Wikipedia articles needing copy edit (Feb 2010), Wikipedia introduction cleanup (Feb 2010)
[[Google Maps]] Articles needing cleanup (Apr 2008), Articles to be expanded (Feb 2009), Articles with dead external links (Jan 2010), Articles with sections that need to be turned into prose (Apr 2008), Articles with unsourced statements (Oct 2009), NPOV disputes (Jan 2010)
[[NORAD Tracks Santa]] Articles that need to differentiate between fact and fiction (Mar 2010), Articles with a promotional tone (Mar 2010), Articles with too many examples, Articles with trivia sections (Mar 2010), Wikipedia articles needing rewrite (Mar 2010), Wikipedia articles with possible conflicts of interest
